titleStmt.title: E. H. Hobson et al. to Unknown
CWG2873

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p: We the undersigned Citizens of the Green River Country respectfully recommend to the Honorable Beriah Magoffin, Govenor of Ky Robert Marshall as a suitable person well qualified and highly Competent, to fill the office of Tobacco Inspector, and we therefore solicit his appointment as such for the next ensuing term at Louisville

E. H. Hobson Shiper
Jas. A. Cox Planter
R. L. Moore
Thos. G. Thompson Planter
Robert Marshall
John J Roach Shiper
J. V. Durham
James G Anderson Buyer
Josiah Mitchell Planter
Rich A Webster Planter
Thos R Barnett Planter
George Hardwill
Gabriel Close Planter
Francis Cowherd Planter
T H Frazer Plan
D. M. Williams Plan
C C Morris
William H Chelf
P M Smith planter
James Durrett do
W J Smith do
Alexander Willson
Moses Blakemon Planter
Holland Planter
John G White Planter
Andy Barnett
F T Murray
Geo W. Swearingen Planter
Alfred Anderson Planter
Wm Barnett
J W Williamson Planter
M A. Vaughn Planter
Frederic Cox Planter
Franklin Anderson
Jno A Marshall Planter
Daniel P White
D. Hudson
Samuel T Robinson

W J Stockton one of the
Propretor of the Todd
ware house in Louisville Ky

C Patteson
Jefferson Henry
John Edweards
David Montgomery
John C Buckner
Recommending Robt Marshall for Tobacco Insp --
